name: Grey-zone
body:
### Welcome to Greyzone
![Grey-Zone](http://userpage.fu-berlin.de/vanhech/swp-2013/Greyzone_1.png)

### Story
Killed in a key-experiment, researching evil, Dr.Eisenhower has to make a descision: Fighting his way through his labratory or hell. Trying to save his soul and research, he learns of the relativity of boarders between good and bad.

### Authors and Contributors
Benni, Chris, Dariush, Flo, Kristin

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Please contact us.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
